channel.title: EKS Credentials on Tools for running HashiCorp Vault on Kubernetes

item.title: EKS Credentials
item.description: AWS Credential Before You Begin You need to have AWS access key ID and AWS secret access key Access key ID & Secret Access Key In order to create cluster within AWS, pharmer needs a dedicated IAM user. pharmer use this user’s API credential. The pharmer user needs following permission to works properly. You can get the Access key ID and Secret Access key by following methods: From the console, click your username.
